Craig was the high school gym teacher. It was pretty apparent by his appearance. He was a well built man, and tall too. He had always been good at sports. While taking his education degree, he decided that he wanted to teach gym class. So he went through all the proper schooling so he could.

The gym classes were divided into boys and girls at his school. He taught the boys from all grades. Of course there were a few other gym teachers.

"Oh no, you would look better as a redhead, not a blonde." Lisa said her client Giselle, a 22-year old French exchange student. She spoke to her while trimming the girl's hair, and the two were discussing Giselle's intention to dye her hair. "Trust me, guys around here seem to prefer redheads, though you do get the ones who just want a woman for one thing and it doesn't matter what colour their hair is."

"You think?" Giselle said in her timid voice, as she looked into the mirror at the woman trimming her currently brown hair. "My classmate Michelle said I might look good as a blonde." He added in a strong French accent.

Lisa chuckled and shook her head. "With an enticing accent like yours, trust me... auburn would be the perfect colour for you."

Giselle was about to speak again when the door to the salon opened, causing the chime above to jingle. Lisa turned, expecting to see another client, but instead she saw a dishelved looking man who was probably in his mid to late 40's. He had on a tattered beanie cap and a parker coat, along with a torn sweater, some grubby jeans and a pair of old boots. He clearly belonged in some back alley somewhere instead of a hairdressers. "Can I help you?" Lisa grimaced, as she paused from giving Giselle her trim.

"Sorry to intrude miss, but can you spare some water for me?" The man asked, scratching his bearded, dirty visage. "I'm thirsty, and tired." He said.

Lisa stood with her hands on her hips for a moment, still holding her scissors and comb, her grimace never disapeared as she began to smell the funk coming off the clearly homeless man. "Does this look like a shelter to you?" She spat, before glancing back to Giselle and deciding she'd better at least appear to be sympathetic. "Look, I have a diet coke if you'd like that? And how about some hand gel?" She said, grabbing an unopened bottle of soda and a small container of Carex hand sanitiser.

"Yes, thank you miss." The man nodded, catching the items as Lisa tossed them at him.

"Yeah, yeah, no worries, now can you leave, please?" Lisa forced out a smile, pointing to the door behind the man. "I need to run my business."

"Of course, the man smiled, "but please accept this for your kindness." The man said, pulling a ring from the right pocket of his coat. It looked to be a ring fitted only for a woman's finger, and it looked surprisingly clean. Eager to get rid of the man, Lisa squirted some hand gel into her left hand before holding it out, allowing the man to place the ring in her palm. She then rubbed both hands together, cleaning both them and the ring at the same time.

"Okay, cool, thank you." Lisa said, thinking the ring to be a worthless piece of costume jewelry.

The man turned and left the hairdressers, and Lisa rolled her eyes and turned back to Giselle. "Sorry about that interruption, that was weird."

"It's okay, that ring looks kind of nice." Giselle chuckled, looking at it in her stylist's hand.

"It's probably worthless." Lisa shrugged, but she slipped it on her ring finger anyway to see how it looked. It was a gold band with a small crimson jewel encrusted in the top. As soon as the ring went on her finger, Lisa felt a strange pulse of energy run through her. She closed her eyes as knowledge filled her head, knowledge of the ring's power that enabled the wearer to swap people's traits and clothing. She couldn't deny that it was real, as the proof was now in her mind. But as to why the man would give away such an item in exchange for a soda and some hand gel was beyond her.

In any case, a smirk appeared on Lisa's face, as she went back to finishing Giselle's hair.

After the chant, nothing seemed to have happened. So, they thought the book was just nonsense and left it there in the attic. They didn't know that was the thing that summoned it.

Soon, she was snapped back to reality by the teacher pulling onto Sam's ear. "Ow ow ow ow ow, I won't do it again! I won't do it again!" Sam repeatedly say. Sab giggled a bit. Suddenly, it appeared, lying down on the air facing upwards towards the ceiling.

Arrow didn't like waiting around in the classroom, so he just phased through the door and wandered the hallways. It was like any normal school: toilets, gym, cafeteria, staff room, principal's office, and a creepy janitor's closet.

A long, thin tail with an arrow-shaped tip stuck out from below her skirt and her pointed ears were each adorned with a single silver ring. She had bloodshot red skin and looked very seductive to most men. Her three sizes were fascinating as well, she has full D-cup breasts, and a well-developed rear that men would drool at.
[TL;DR: This is the same demoness from Terry's path, so please don't file a lawsuit on me]

The demoness was walking casually in the hallways, possibly bored as well as Arrow was. She was probably summoned into this world, and if that's the case, her summoner should be near. Arrow started to be cautious of the said summoner but...

"What am I doing? That's not like me at all. I forgot about myself for a moment there." Arrow spouted utter nonsense.

Arrow approached the sexy demoness and made small talk with her. "Why greetings fellow demoness, I seek your humble attention." Arrow spoke with sincerity.

The demoness didn't expect that and jumped back a bit. (Around 3 metres) "Who are you?" She asked.

She was quiet and kept glaring at Arrow. Arrow felt uncomfortable under the stares of a beautiful demoness and felt like time would be wasted too much, so it introduced himself.

We still actually do need our master's permission, but after that is just plain freedom." Arrow explained. "Oh, and I can tell your contract isn't done correctly, so you also have more freedom compared to other beings."

"Hmm... The offer is tempting... Alright, I'll try getting permission from my master." She agreed to your suggestion before running off to her master.

"All according to the hands of fate..." Arrow said walking back to Sam's and Sab's classroom.

During third period, both summoned beings had gotten permission from their respective masters and headed out to meet each other in front of the first floor's toilets.

Thinking his sister sent Lila in her place, he approached her with great strides. He was still an idiot.

But...
1521221.title: A Swap between Arrow and Xyllia

15212211.content:
"Sigh..." Arrow released a puff of stress. After the confession, the group of three (Sam, Sab & Lila) left. A light breeze filled the atmosphere, leaves were falling, frogs were croaking, water was dripping from a nearby pipe. A gentle atmosphere was presented but Arrow didn't seem like usual.

"Why...? What did I do wrong..." Arrow mumbled.

Xyllia, a few feet away from Arrow, heard this and wondered what it was that was muttered. She tried taking a step forward only to be blocked by her master. Her master took her away, leaving Arrow under the tree, talking to the airs of distress.

"Why? I am only an observer. So why do you do this? Why am I being disregarded!? By my own junior at that! This is unheard of, blasphemy!... I should calm down a bit. I'm breaking my ego..."

Storytime

Arrow leaned back on the tree and thought deeply about his words. Arrow was a talent during his early years. He was regarded as a prodigy in the world of the gods, a fearful menace, a sharp dagger that can stab through anyone's flesh. Arrow became a god only when he was around 6 years (human appearance) and was in charge of the rule of time. Many badmouthed him, saying "The creator god was merely choosing favouritism" and "He's not going to keep that title for long." It was all madness, Arrow was very young at the time and he was afraid of defeat. Just before giving up, he met these wonderful people who encouraged him, who guided him throughout his duties and blocked out any negative feelings towards him. He felt his world shining back up again only to be faced with a tragedy. Arrow was framed for the murder of these said people. What's worse was that Arrow also obtained the said people's powers, Space & Distortion, but mysteriously, he didn't receive Death. Evidence was piled up on Arrow, his verdict was announced as guilty, and he was sealed away for thousands of years.

After the seal worn down, Arrow soon was awakened being at least 13 years old (human appearance). He found himself in some kind of human civilisation. He was standing on what seems to be gravel, and his surroundings told him that he was surrounded by these tall living organisms. He heard a sound in the distance and spotted a little girl, 13 years of age, drinking from the flowing stream of water. She was very cute, and his instincts told him to protect that girl from danger. He kept staring at the girl. The girl looked to be around 4 feet in height, and was wearing unusual clothing. The girl stopped drinking and immediately left the vicinity. Arrow sneakily chased after her. After following her for about three or so minutes, the girl had lead him to her village. It was a small residential area filled with a small population of humans. Using the powers of distortion, he opened up a distorted portal and went through it.

Storytime 2

Elise Freelight, 13 years old, profession: time traveler. Elise looked like your normal neighborhood girl, but she was actually a time traveler. She has time travelled to multiple phases of the world and is considered the youngest time traveler in existence. In this period, she was assigned to deal with a terrible threat that could disrupt history. Not knowing the details of this existence, she kept caution on her surroundings, never letting her guard down.

"I need to take a break once in a while..." She said before heading out of the village. She mindlessly wandered the forest's jungle and soon she came across a river. Pure water was flowing downstream, so she took a sip and decided to cool off her mind there. Then, she could feel a foreign entity looming over her. She carefully scanned the area with her eyes, keeping her head down, and spotted a figure in the grass. It seemed dangerous, so she hurriedly went back to the village and prepared her hunting gear. That entity didn't seem normal, so she prepared for the worst.

Storytime Part 3

After stepping through the disfigured portal, he reemerged from it, but in one of the residential houses. Fortunately, no one was home, so he spied on the little girl again, who was coincidentally next door. He saw her magnificent bright red hair, occasionally popping up on the bottom side of the window. She was taking something out from what seemed to be like a suitcase.

Then, when she looked up, she saw Arrow staring at her. Her movements immediately went faster and more disorderly, only to be finished. She held up what seemed to be a long device that could release projectiles at amazing speeds. It was an assault rifle. She reloaded the rifle, and started approaching your current location. Thinking it may be dangerous, Arrow vanished into the shadows of the room, leaving no trace of his presence.

Elise was confused now. She could've sworn she saw some dark figure in that room. "Maybe that's the threat." She thought. Elise lowered her rifle and searched the area for its presence. Her sixth sense was telling her to be cautionary and a hand covered her mouth. Her muffles cannot be heard by anyone. "Is this the end? Can I really not stop this threat?" She thought, until the hand let her go.

Elise turned around and "Peekaboo!" shouted Arrow. Elise was stunned by his act, and quickly pointed the nose of her rifle towards his chest.

"Chill girl! Chill. I'm only an innocent little guy." Arrow said with a playful tone.

Elise wasn't letting up and demanded Arrow to speak about him.

"Alright, I'll speak." Then, Arrow told Elise of his life, his sealing and his awakening. Elise was surprised when Arrow called himself a god and was considering his unbelievable statement. "Why not you tell me who you are as well, as fair trade?" Elise glared at him, then relented. She told Arrow of her profession, her mission and her struggles.

"So, you're looking for a anomaly in this period huh? And you're trying to eliminate it?"

"That's right."

"And you think that I might be the said anomaly?"

"Exactly on point."

"So I must be eliminated so history will not be altered?"

"If you get it, any last words?"

"What if I come with you to the future?"

"Are you outrageous? We're not allowed to bring anyone of the past into the future."

"But you said that I was an anomaly, so technically, I don't belong in this period."

"Hmm... Fair point. You can come with me, only if you behave."

"Aye aye, captain."

"Don't call me that." Then, they sailed off towards the land of destiny. The land ruled by science, the future, is near.

"Let me show you," Xyllia grinned as she stood up from where she sat on Terry's bed.

As the demoness stepped forward into the light, Terry got a much better look at her. She was tall, about 5'8" naturally, enhanced to 5'11" by the 3-inch heels of the thigh-high black leather boots she wore. The rest of her outfit consisted of a sleeveless black leather crop top with a deep neckline, which was held together by a leather string that criss-crossed several times across her impressive cleavage, and a short black leather skirt with a skimpy black leather thong underneath. A long, thin tail with an arrow-shaped tip stuck out from below her skirt and her pointed ears were each adorned with a single silver ring. Her figure was quite voluptuous and Terry found himself wondering how her large D-cup breasts weren't spilling out of her top. However, despite the demon's curvaceous, feminine figure, there was also a hint of strong, toned, lean muscle to her form.

"Like what you see?" Xyllia asked teasingly, licking her black lips with her surprisingly long pointed tongue.

Terry felt himself flush red as he realized he'd been ogling the sexy demoness in front of him.

"You humans are so predictable," Xyllia laughed, her bright yellow eyes alight with amusement. "But enough about that." The demoness pointed a finger tipped with a sharp black nail at Terry. "I was about to demonstrate my power." With that, Xyllia snapped her fingers and the two were suddenly standing in the street outside Terry's house.

"Woah," Terry gasped as he breathed in the cool evening air.

"That was nothing," Xyllia said. "Most demons can do that. My real power is my ability to exchange traits between people." Her pointed teeth locked together in a grin as she pointed out Terry's neighbors across the street, Linda and Steve, getting out of their car after a night out. "Watch them."

Terry watched, awestruck, as Xyllia worked her magic on the pair. The married couple, both in their early 30s, began to change before his very eyes. Linda, a petite blonde, suddenly shot up drastically in height and her body swelled with muscle as she gained her husband's height and physique. By contrast, Steve shrank in both areas as he gained his wife's height and physique. As if nothing had changed, the couple walked to the door and entered their house.

"Holy shit!" Terry practically shouted. "They didn't notice a thing."

"My 'playthings' only notice my alterations if I allow it," Xyllia explained. "They only notice me if I allow it."

"So why did you allow me to see you?" Terry asked, his curiosity growing.

"Well if, you must know, you summoned me," Xyllia told him.

"I did what?"

"You summoned me ... technically. You did a particularly poor job of it, but it counts."

"It must've been that book ..." Terry muttered, recalling an old book on demonology he found that morning when helping his mom clean the attic.

"Ah, a book mishap," Xyllia said. "That'd do it. So, anyway, you summoned me and now we're bonded."

"We're bonded? What does that mean?" Terry asked.

"Well, it means that you're the human I need to channel my power through in order to affect the world ... and there are certain things I need your permission for before I can do them," Xyllia explained, neglecting to mention that there were usually more restrictions, but the botched summoning job had left her with considerably more freedom than normal. Normally, she needed permission from her summoner to do anything. This was going to be much more fun.

"Oh?" Terry asked. "Such as?"

"Such as swapping myself."

"I see ..."

"Yeah, demon rules are weird. But who cares? Let's have some fun. What do you say, human?"

"It's Terry."

"Alright, Terry, how would you like to have some fun?" Xyllia grinned. This human had no idea that telling her his name had the potential to give her more power over him.

Meanwhile, Terry, who was ignorant to the laws of magic and demons, had been enticed by the promise of entertainment. This was the excitement he was waiting for.

He nodded and flashed a smile. "You've got yourself a deal, Xyllia."

Xyllia grinned once more. "Perfect."

Due to its weakened state, however, it needed Britney to do the swapping for it ... or so it claimed. Britney had no reason to doubt it, though ... or so she thought.

The entity explained how its power worked and how Britney was supposed to activate it and then it sent her on her way. Stepping out into the living room of the apartment she shared with her roommates, she took a look around.

Kim lay passed out on the couch, having not made it to her room. Typical, Britney thought.

Then there was Nikki. She'd left her door open again and Britney could see her lying in bed with the dude she'd hooked up with last night at the bar. Both were also passed out. Again? Britney thought to herself.

Looking out the window next, Britney saw that there were plenty of people to swap out there as well. She certainly had options.

As she thought, Britney looked down at her roommate sleeping on the couch for a few moments, then gazed across the room toward her other roommate's open door. She still wasn't sure if she wanted to swap either of them. Strangers she had no problem messing with, but she liked her roommates.

info.brief_description: Someone swaps traits with people in various scenario's.
info.description:
This story is about our main character swapping traits with other people because of various conditions.
Multiple main characters will be available and will be described in the character selection, feel free to suggest any additional characters.
Side characters can be added as you wish as long as their inclusion fits the character and story, some side characters (like girlfriends or family members) could be predetermined within descriptions as well.

Have fun with the story without many limitations, just the usual stuff like no unnecessary deaths or gore, keep it fun for everyone (above 18 at least).
Make sure you keep the swaps descriptive and interesting, sex is fine, but don't overuse it as it is not the main focus of the story.
As well as this, try to make sure the chapters stay interesting and different, chapter which contradict previous chapters may be deleted if it creates too much confusion.

Try to write decently sized chapters, after the first few branches do not create chapters containing only a few sentences , these will be deleted if they get out of hand.
The style of writing will be in third person, please keep this theme throughout the story.

On a more positive note! I will recognize good chapters in some form, which will usually be in the form of points.

Other than these rules, have fun with it and let you imagination go wild! *Smile*

If you enjoy this story, check out my sister series:
https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/2187108-A-curious-clothes-exchange...
